title: Bug 3666 - CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
description:
Bug 3666 - CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)

Under certain circumstances, code assist eats too much code. When adding a parameter to the baz call in bar, the code assist should only replace the text until the cursor location.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the class X
2. Inside the method bar, add a parameter to the baz call
3. Check the code after the code assist operation
